name: Border control simulator
description:
Aliens have invaded the city!! You, Border Patrol officer must defend the city from aliens. Make wise decisions to allow only humans to cross the border and purge any aliens who try to cross the border as well!!

This game was made in Coppercube 6. Inspired by a lot of the low budget horror games Youtubers play (Except there is no horror in this game :} ) Please enjoy!
